**Load packages and functions**
```{r message=FALSE}

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

# Functions

```

**Import Data**   
```{r}
ema <- read_csv("data/Cleaned Daily EMA April 2016.csv")

about_data(ema)
names(ema)
```
